mapper.select: SELECT A.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID , A.ITEM_NAME , A.ITEM_STATUS , A.PRICE , (SELECT C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY C WHERE C.CATEGORY_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_NAME , (SELECT C.CATEGORY_ID FROM CATEGORY C WHERE C.CATEGORY_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_ID , A.POST_YN FROM PRODUCT_ITEM A INNER JOIN ITEM_IMG B ON A.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID = B.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID

SELECT A.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID , A.ITEM_NAME , A.ITEM_STATUS , A.ITEM_SUBJECT , A.PRICE , A.POST_YN , A.STOCK , A.CATEGORY_ID , (SELECT C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY C WHERE A.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_NAME , B.IMG_ID , B.URL_IMG_PATH /* 출력용 이미지 주소 url */ FROM PRODUCT_ITEM A INNER JOIN ITEM_IMG B ON A.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID = B.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID WHERE A.PRODUCT_ITEM_ID = #{productItemId}
